entry.title: Haribo Gold-Bears Gummy Candy Theater Box - 3.4 oz.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Haribo
Type: Candy District
Price: 2.29

Old Fashioned Candy Since 1922

For the gold standard in gummy bears, Haribo Gold-Bears Gummy Candy is the original! Since 1922, we've been gobbling up these delicious chewy, gummy candy bears by the mouthful! Haribo Gold-Bears come in a variety of five amazing fruity flavours including Rasberry, Orange, Lemon, Strawberry and Pineapple. The Haribo Gold-Bears Gummy Candy Theater Box will make every movie a blockbuster!
3.4 oz.

entry.title: WarHeads Ooze Chewz Theater Box - 99 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Impact Confections
Type: Candy
Price: 2.49

Sour Chewy Candy Filled With Ooze!

It's really all about the ooze with this sour candy!

The Warheads Ooze Chews Theater Box is filled with the sourest and fruitiest flavours that you have ever tasted! Offering you a tangy tasting "ooze" with each and every sour candy, the bold flavours include, Mango, Strawberry, Green Apple, Black Cherry, Watermelon, and Blue Rasberry! This is one sour candy that is definitely not for your Grandma's crystal candy dish! Get ready for your sour dreams to become a sourful and powerful reality, with the Warheads Ooze Chews Theater Box!

entry.title: Bazooka Throwback Original Bubble Gum Theater Box - 4 oz.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bazooka Candy Brands
Type: Candy
Price: 3.49

Throwback Bubble Gum Fun!

We all recognize the iconic red, white and blue Bazooka Bubble Gum box. Remember those square pieces of bubble gum, each wrapped with a logo-emblazoned wrapper? These are what you will discover in this Throwback Original Bubble Gum Theater Box.

This juicy pink gum tingles your tastebuds as soon as you start to chew. You'll be blowing bubbles in no time! With Classic Comics included, this is a treat you'll want to give the kids while you share memories of your own childhood.

Enjoy some good old-fashioned fun with this legendary treat by Bazooka Candy Brands. Go retro and place your order now!

  • Includes Classic Comics
4 oz.

Ingredients:

Sugar, gum base, glucose syrup, natural and artificial flavours, glycerine, citric acid, titanium dioxide, BHT (preservative), red 40 lake, red 40. May contain soy.

Ingredients and nutritional information provided by the manufacturer and considered accurate at the time of posting. Refer to product labelling or contact manufacturer directly for current data.

Limited Edition Mike and Ike Candies

Remember those times as a kid when you went to the amusement park? All those rides, stalls and games. It felt like a magical wonderland. And don't forget the aroma and taste of that heavenly cotton candy you begged your parents for or spent your pocket money on.

Get ready for some major nostalgia! Mike and Ike Cotton Candy Candy are available in a theatre pack for a limited time only. These compact little morsels contain all the scrumptiously sweet taste of cotton candy. You can take this on-the-go or enjoy some time in front of the TV watching the movies as you did on the classic silver screen.

  • Gluten-Free
